forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 20C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 69F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
